Class Preload

java.lang.Object
edu.cairn.cis332finalproject.Preload
public class Preload extends Object
Manages scene preloading and navigation for the application. Preloads all FXML scenes to improve performance when switching between views.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • setPrimaryStage

      public static void setPrimaryStage(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Sets the primary stage for scene switching.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - the main application window

    • preloadScenes

      public static void preloadScenes()
      Preloads all application scenes to improve performance. Loads each FXML file and stores the loader for later use. This allows for faster scene switching and controller access.

    • switchScene

      public static void switchScene(String sceneName, String title)
      Switches the displayed scene in the primary stage.
      Parameters:
      sceneName - the name of the scene to display
      title - the window title to set

    • getController

      public static <T> T getController(String sceneName)
      Gets the controller for a specific scene.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of controller to return
      Parameters:
      sceneName - the name of the scene
      Returns:
      the controller instance or null if not found
